thread.title: Angry Jeremy Kyle guest repeatedly tries to charge past Security Steve at son's ex-girlfriend in 'outrageous' show
thread.title_full: Angry Jeremy Kyle guest repeatedly tries to charge past Security Steve at son's ex-girlfriend in 'outrageous' show

author: Hayley Minn
title: Angry Jeremy Kyle guest repeatedly tries to charge past Security Steve at son's ex-girlfriend in 'outrageous' show
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Today’s Jeremy Kyle Show was labeled “outrageous” when a guest constantly tried to charge past Security Steve at her son’s ex - before the host was forced to check a guest’s shoes for drugs. 
Tasha was on the ITV show after finding out her boyfriend ‘DJ Double Decks’ Dave had cheated on her when she saw him on the Jeremy Kyle Show with another girl Amy - after which viewers prayed for urgent dental care for the guests. 
Tasha is now with Amy’s ex Anthony, and was with him on today’s show. 
Anthony’s mum Destiny then also returned to the show - charging at Dave and Amy. Read More She had to repeatedly be held back (Photo: ITV) Security Steve - AND the other guests held her back (Photo: ITV) 
Security Steve managed to hold her back, but that didn’t stop her! 
After continually launching herself at DJ Dave and Amy, she told Jeremy that Dave had drugs in his shoes. 
Jeremy made the DJ take his shoes and socks off to prove he didn’t have anything on him, and found nothing. 
Back to the point of the show - Tasha wanted to prove Dave had cheated on her with Amy. Read More Tasha was livid when she saw her boyfriend Dave on the Jeremy Kyle Show with Amy (Photo: ITV) He insisted he wasn't cheating (Photo: ITV) And Tasha was right (Photo: ITV) 
She’d been saying he was trying to make Amy - who was wearing the same hoodie as Tasha - look like her, saying: “He’s made you dye your hair dark to look like me!” 
And Dave did a lie detector test to prove he hadn’t cheated on Tasha with Amy. 
But it turns out he had - which was news to Amy too! 
Tasha and Anthony no longer have contact with Dave and Amy - but will be back AGAIN on a future show! 
*The Jeremy Kyle Show continues on ITV1 weekdays at 9.25am Like us on Facebook
